cat_desc: A general or fallback category used when no specific match is available.
Parent category for all food and basic essentials-related assistance.
Help users find food banks, pantries, and government meal programs.
Request help with grocery shopping and doorstep delivery by volunteers.
Users can request help from volunteers to assist with basic cooking and kitchen tasks.
Parent category for all clothing-related assistance and services.
Allow users (donors) to donate clothes based on their location.
Allow users to borrow clothes easily via the platform.
Subcategory for emergency needs including clothing, food, and shelter during crises.
Enable users in crisis situations (e.g., natural disasters, sudden displacement) to request clothing help.
Notify users when seasonal clothing drives are active, allowing them to donate or request items.
Users can request clothing repair (e.g., seams, zippers) via volunteers or local tailoring partners.
Parent category for all housing-related assistance and services.
Help users find compatible roommates by posting listings or providing compatibility guidance.
Assist with understanding rental agreements, finding rental listings, and navigating tenant rights.
Help users buy or sell secondhand furniture and home essentials (remote).
In-person support for packing, sorting, or organizing small items during a move.
In-person support for light cleaning tasks such as dusting, sweeping, and tidying common areas.
Support for non-urgent minor repairs like furniture fixes, plumbing, or appliance help.
Assistance setting up internet, electricity, water, and other services during a move-in.
Parent category for education and career-related help.
Guidance for navigating college application tasks.
Review and feedback on SOPs, essays, and academic statements.
Academic tutoring for specific subjects or standardized tests.
Parent category for health-related assistance and non-clinical wellness support.
Help users find appropriate professionals or clinics.
Assist with OTC medication pickup or pharmacy navigation.
Access general mental health resources or referrals.
Set up non-clinical reminders for OTC medication or supplements.
Wellness awareness on hygiene, sleep, nutrition, etc.
Parent category for elderly and community-related support.
Help seniors find housing and assist with the moving process.
Support with using phones, tablets, and apps.
Medication reminders or health device setup (non-clinical).
Assistance with errands or transport to appointments.
Companionship and social activities (calls, walks, games).
Help cooking meals or prepping food based on dietary needs.
